original_text: Not many of you should become teachers, my fellow believers, because you know that we who teach will be judged more strictly.
korean_text: 내 형제들아 너희는 선생된 우리가 더 큰 심판을 받을 줄 알고 선생이 많이 되지 말라

sentences.original_text: Not many of you should become teachers
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 많은 사람들이 가르치는 자가 되어서는 안 된다

sentences.original_text: that we who teach will be judged
